name: Jared Rickert
title: Software Engineer - Full Stack Developer
summary:
Versatile Software Engineer with 4+ years of experience across
full-stack development, DevOps, and systems administration. Proven
ability to design, implement, and stabilize production sites
end-to-end, improve performance and security, and accelerate
developer workflows. Strong practical experience with PHP, Go,
TypeScript/JavaScript (React/Angular), AWS, Keycloak (CIAM),
SEO/analytics, containerization, and CI/CD. AWS Certified
Developer.

Implemented MFA and Keycloak for CIAM
Improved performance via WebP, caching strategies
SEO improvements with JSON-LD, sitemaps, GA4
Built AI-powered CMS developer tool (~30% acceleration)
experience.technologies: PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, GTM/GA4, Keycloak, reCAPTCHA, Bash, Proxmox, FreeBSD
